prf::SimplePredicate

prf::SimplePredicate< T > Class Template Reference
[ProFASi PDB handling module]

An extensible composite-capable simple predicate class. More...

#include <CompositePredicate.hh>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class prf::SimplePredicate< T >

A simple predicate is a function object that returns true or false depending on the state of a variable of a certain type. For instance, a predicate can be written, which takes integer variables as argument, and returns true if they are even. The template argument "T" here, is the type of data object the composite predicate is supposed to work on, integers in the above example.
